comments:
Running 20021023 build of Eclipse.
Load SWT from the repository (as of now).
Try to run an inner Eclipse.  I cannot.  I get errors whenever I try to look at 
the children of a tree item.  Here is the walkback.  The errors do not occur if 
I load SWT from the build's plugin directory.
Note I am on Win98.
